mapper.update: UPDATE wms_outbound_order_info_to_material SET status_type = ${status},update_by=#{username},update_time=now() WHERE order_number = #{orderNumber} AND is_deleted = 0

UPDATE wms_outbound_order_info_to_material wooitm SET wooitm.status_type = ${status},update_by=#{username},update_time=now() WHERE wooitm.order_number IN (SELECT wooi.order_number FROM wms_outbound_order_info wooi WHERE wooi.wave_number = #{waveNumber}) AND is_deleted = 0
